description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the critical remote code execution vulnerability (CVE-2022-3775) associated with the grub2 heap-based out-of-bounds write, apply the necessary updates as specified in the Microsoft Security Response Center guidance:

1. Identify your Windows version from the list provided below.
2. Download the corresponding KB updates from the Microsoft Update Catalog.
3. Install the updates on your system to ensure all affected components are patched.
4. After installation, restart your system to apply the updates and ensure vulnerability resolution.

**Details**:
- Updates for various builds: 
   - Windows 11 Version 24H2 (KB5041571)
   - Windows 11 Version 23H2 (KB5041585)
   - Windows 10 Version 22H2 (KB5041580)
   - Windows 10 Version 21H2 (KB5041592)
   - Windows 10 (KB5041782)
- Update package URLs:
  - [KB5041782](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041782)
  - [KB5041585](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041585)
  - [KB5041580](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041580)
  - [KB5041571](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041571)
  - [KB5041592](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041592)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your operating system version matches the one listed above.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
